nike-air-zoom-pegasus-39.title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39
nike-air-zoom-pegasus-39.summary: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 is a lightweight running shoe built for daily miles.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 is a lightweight running shoe built for daily miles.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 is a lightweight running shoe built for daily miles.
nike-air-zoom-pegasus-39.description: With Zoom Air units and engineered mesh, it offers breathable comfort and responsive cushioning. More Air, less bulk. The Dn8 takes our Dynamic Air system and condenses it into a sleek, low-profile package. Powered by eight pressurized Air tubes, it gives you a responsive sensation with every step.
